with compiz-fusion you can go to the desktop cube section and then you can set it up under the appearance tab so that each face of your "cube" or w/e shape you have will have its own wallpaper
i found an easier way to do it if you are interested.  in configuration editor go to apps, nautilus, preferences, and uncheck the show_desktop box
